name: ScraperIs
description: This package allows AI assistants to scrape web content through the MCP protocol, enabling them to access up-to-date information from the web. Features Web Scraping: Extract content from any website Screenshots: Capture visual representations of web pages Multiple Formats: Get content in markdown, HTML, or JSON Progress Updates: Real-time progress reporting during scraping operations MCP Integration: Seamless integration with MCP-compatible AI assistants
